SEARCH
Package sh.brane.core.types

Class FixedSizeG1Point

java.lang.Object
sh.brane.core.types.FixedSizeG1Point
Direct Known Subclasses:
KzgCommitment, KzgProof
public abstract sealed class FixedSizeG1Point extends Object permits KzgCommitment, KzgProof
Abstract base class for fixed-size 48-byte G1 points on the BLS12-381 curve.

Both KZG commitments and KZG proofs are compressed G1 points of exactly 48 bytes. This sealed class provides the common functionality for size validation, defensive copying, and content-based equality semantics.

This class is immutable and thread-safe. The internal byte array is defensively copied on construction and when accessed via toBytes().

Since:
0.2.0

      protected FixedSizeG1Point(byte[] data, String typeName)
      Creates a G1 point from raw bytes.
      Parameters:
      data - the point data, must be exactly 48 bytes

      Throws:
